page.title: 07Entertainment in Frome
page.content: {The Merlin theatre}is 11 yrs old & was opened in 1974.It seats 250 people.The Merlin theatre is organised by a director, head of drama at the College, & run by two Committees. It is financed partly by Somerset County Council, so that the College can use it for drama , & partly by S. W. Arts & takings from the box office. The theatre is used by local schools & clubs, as well as touring professional companies. {Cinema.}There is only one cinema in Frome, the Westway. The Grand cinema has recently closed. {The Hexagon}is just over 10 yrs old at the side of the Grand cinema, which has recently closed. It is a modern building, many musicans & live groups appear here. Claire Carpenter
